requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

results.name: The Dawning Clocks of Time Remake

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: AMD RYZEN 5 2.9GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RYZEN 5 7600X iGPU or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Requires a screen resolution of 1920x1080 or higher. Uses Vulkan 1.1 by default on supported GPUs. If Vulkan is not supported, DirectX is used instead.
